item.description:
Hello Everyone!

Thanks to all the great tips, we are going to have a great fun night next Friday, June 15th.

Let's meet up for sushi dinner at Takeshima Restaurant at 308 Harvard St
Brookline around 7pm. The restaurant is located 2 blocks away from Coolidge Corner stop on C Line (Green Line). Check this website out for more details: http://www.greenlinem...

Then, after dinner, we can grab a movie at Coolidge Corner Theatre at 290 Harvard Street, Brookline. After a good meal, it will be time for us to sit down and enjoy a movie, don't you think?

Don't feel pressured to do both. If you can only do one of them, that's no problem!! Bring your friends with you if you like ;D

See you all there
Simon & Soyoko

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Sushi and Moive Night Next Friday, June 15th
